name: Plesiosaurus
movement: walking speed 20 feet, swimming speed 40 feet
description: A large, aquatic dinosaur with a long neck, broad body, and flippers adapted for swimming.
memorable: Its long neck and powerful jaws can deal significant damage and pull prey closer.
goals: Hunting fish and marine life, occasionally becoming territorial if disturbed.
relations: Can be encountered alongside other aquatic creatures or dinosaurs.
environment: Deep lakes, rivers, and coastal waters.
strengths: Exceptional swimming ability and high strength allow it to overpower foes in water.
weaknesses: Poor performance on land and low intelligence makes it vulnerable to clever tactics.
attacks: Melee bite attack with a reach of 10 feet, dealing piercing damage and with a pull effect.
most_powerful_ability: Hold Breath allows it to remain submerged for up to 1 hour.
skills: Capable of stealth, enhancing its ambush abilities underwater.
additional_information: Can negate critical hits with its Hardy ability.
Can use Flipper Slam to create shockwaves affecting opponents.
Not capable of meaningful communication due to low intelligence.
Forms part of the aquatic predator ecosystem.
test_queries: large aquatic dinosaur with powerful jaws
predator that can hold breath underwater
monster that swims fast and bites hard
Dinosaur found in deep lakes and rivers
creature that creates shockwaves in water
